content: Out of curiosity I checked the Polish variant and it appears to be broken. After picking "I use Rust" it jumps to page 4 (just like English one), but it returns questions associated with "Why I don't use Rust". Hmm
Can confirm, I had to use English version.
cc @Igor Matuszewski (polish translator), maybe you will have less work :)
if you want to see if you can fix, seems fine, but otherwise maybe we should just remove the ilnk
however, now that I'm looking at it I can't help but feel that something is out of place
There's immediately a multiple choice of "Do you use Rust: 1) Yes 2) No, I stopped 3) No, never did" After which you jump to sections 5, 3 or 4 respectively
But there's an unnamed Section 1 which contains subsections of the options listed above above
is it an old section that's hidden and should not be exposed?
